archimate:DataObject.name: ResourceSpecRunsSoftwareSpec
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The association class is used to show the status of a SoftwareSpecification that can run on any ResourceSpecification. For example; the status may reflect that it can or can no longer be run. The association was made so that any type of resource (within reason!) could run Software; such as a CompoundResource; LogicalDevice or PhysicalDevice.
